scripts.build-purescript: pulp browserify -O --transform envify --standalone Make --skip-entry-point -m Api -t build/bundle.js --no-check-main
scripts.build: npm run install-dependencies && npm run build-purescript
scripts.watch: pulp -w browserify -O --transform envify --standalone Make --skip-entry-point -m Api -t build/bundle.js --no-check-main
